definition.name: Dart/Flutter Package Analyzer
definition.description: Performs static analysis, linting, formatting, to compute the Pub score of your Dart/Flutter package.
definition.author: axel-op

inputs.name: githubToken
inputs.description: Token to connect to GitHub. Use secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN

inputs.name: relativePath
inputs.description: Path of the package relatively to the root of the repository

outputs.name: total_max
outputs.description: Maximum score the package can get

outputs.name: conventions
outputs.description: Score for the category 'Follow Dart file conventions'

outputs.name: conventions_max
outputs.description: Maximum score for the category 'Follow Dart file conventions'

outputs.name: documentation_max
outputs.description: Maximum score for the category 'Provide documentation'

outputs.name: platforms
outputs.description: Score for the category 'Support multiple platforms'

outputs.name: platforms_max
outputs.description: Maximum score for the category 'Support multiple platforms'

outputs.name: analysis_max
outputs.description: Maximum score for the category 'Static analysis'

outputs.name: dependencies
outputs.description: Score for the category 'Support up-to-date dependencies'

outputs.name: dependencies_max
outputs.description: Maximum score for the category 'Support up-to-date dependencies'

outputs.name: json_output
outputs.description: The pana output in JSON format

evidence.reasoning: The action performs static analysis, linting, and formatting, which are all related to code quality. It also evaluates documentation and testing aspects of the Dart/Flutter package.
